items.text: back of a length on off stump. Looks to punch towards long-on and the bowler dives to his right in his follow-through to cut it off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: flat and full outside off, presses forward to push to extra-cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: ooh, nice flight outside off and it dips a little shorter than Mushfiq expects as he comes forward to drive. Pops it in the air, but to the right of the diving extra-cover fielder
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: nice variations of pace here. Flatter and quicker again, the front-of-the-hand slider skidding on towards off stump. Goes back and dabs into the point region
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller and straighter, clipped into the square leg region
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: googly, turning in towards off stump, goes on the back foot to punch into the point region
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short outside off, stops on the batsman so he can't really hit this square. Flat-batted to extra-cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off and Mushfiq stretches out to slog-sweep. Top-edges, but it loops up safely beyond midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: quicker, close to off stump, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: comes down the track to loft it straight. Ball hits the outer half of the bat and loops up over the backward point region
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: flatter, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: flat length ball, plays a stand-up sweep down to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length ball close to off stump, presses forward, waits, and dabs gently into the backward point region
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: tossed up full, close to off stump, clipped down to long-on
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: once again, a flighted ball that lands full and close to off stump. Clips it down to long-on for another single
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: flighted full-toss on off stump. Makes room for the inside-out drive, hits it straight to extra-cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: shortish, a bit of width, punched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, slapped to deep point. Was the googly but the line was a giveaway, the length was all wrong, and it didn't turn much either
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: another googly, more flight and fuller. Stretches forward, lets it come, and dabs towards backward point with soft hands
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: yikes. Looped up slow outside off and Muthun stretches out to reverse-sweep. Only manages a top-edge that balloons up behind the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: flat length ball spinning from middle to off, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: down the track to this flighted ball on middle and off, and drives-inside out through extra-cover. Literally, because it went through the fielder there, Asif Ali not managing to bend down quickly enough to stop it
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: short on off stump and Mithun rocks back to pull to the right of long-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: short again, outside off this time. Through his pull a little early and the ball hits the toe end and rolls to straight midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run
